name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify DEEZinator or App Favicon Colorizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the favicon color based on the Shopify app directory.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify App Favicon Colorizer helps you visually differentiate between the apps you're using in your Shopify admin dashboard by dynamically changing the favicon color based on the current app you're viewing. With this extension, you can easily identify apps at a glance without needing to switch tabs or search through your browser's taskbar.
